Name: Alexandra Leos
Description:
Alejandra was shot in the back as she was riding away from her home in Memphis on a bicycle. Reportedly she had just had an argument with her killer.

Her flatmate Marshall Pegues was charged with first degree murder.

TvT project: Huffington Post 08.09.2014 & News Channel 3 07.09.2014

Name: Cris
Description:
Cris was shot 4 times by a man in a car. She died at the scene.

> At around 11 pm yesterday (13), Siate (Integrated System for Emergency and Trauma Assistance) of the Fire and Military Police Corps of the 14th BPM of Foz do Iguaçu were called to attend the corner of Sérgio Gasparetto Street with Rua Pardais, in front of a consulting company in the neighborhood of Portal da Foz, to provide care for the victim of a shooting.
> 
> Upon arrival it was determined that the victim had already died.
> 
> According to witnesses, the victim was a trans woman known as Cris. She was talking to others when someone inside a white VW / Santana or Golf vehicle took out a revolver and fired four shots at her. He fled at high speed.

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & J Cattelan  14.09.2014

https://www.portalguaira.com/foz-travesti-e-assassinado-com-varios-tiros-imagens-fortes/

Description:

TvT partner organization: Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans

Name: Martel Ramón Figueroa Ortiz
Description:
When the police arrived the victim was already dead. Neighbours of the victim claim that unknown men were responsible.

> A [trans woman] was killed early this Saturday morning on the road to the Ticamaya sector of Choloma, Cortés, in northern Honduras.
>
> Police authorities reported that people who travel daily for the sector filed the complaint. The scene has been secured since 7:00 am.
> 
> The body was lying on the dirt road about 200 meters from the main road, in the scene there was also a used condom for what the authorities presume was violated before being killed.
>
> The victim has not been identified by the forensic medicine authorities, but at the time of the murder she wore a blue shorts, green shirt and white sandals.
>
> In a bushes a bottle of beer, a red wallet, a pair of sandals and condoms were also found.

TvT partner organization: Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans

https://www.laprensa.hn/sucesos/policiales/747481-98/matan-a-un-transexual-hondure%C3%B1o-en-el-sector-de-ticamaya

Name: Cielo Mercado
Description:
The victim's body was found in her apartment. Her body presented  18 stab wounds.

TvT partner organization: STRAP

Name: Mahadevi
Description:
Mahadevi was thrown off a moving train by two youths, killing her immediately. The youths escaped.

> An Indian transgender woman died yesterday after she was pushed off a moving train in Bangalore.
>
> Mahadevi, 22, was pushed by two youths and died on the spot, witnesses told the New Indian Express.
>
> Passengers caught the youths and beat them. They were planning to hand them over to the police but the youths escaped.
>
> Mahadevi was speech-impaired and used to beg on the Bangalore-Hubli Intercity Express. She had boarded the train at 1.30 pm.
>
> A boy who sells tea on the train told her community and they rushed to the scene.
>
> A railway police officer said, ‘We heard about a body on the tracks and have registered a case. We are trying to ascertain if Mahadevi fell from the train or was pushed to death.’

TvT project: The New Indian Express, 25.09.2014

https://www.dailykos.com/stories/2014/11/20/1345807/-Speaking-for-the-Dead-Transgender-Day-of-Remembrance

https://www.gaystarnews.com/article/india-trans-woman-pushed-train-dies250914/

https://www.newindianexpress.com/cities/bengaluru/2014/sep/25/Transgender-Pushed-Out-of-Train-Dies-664916.html

https://boston.edgemedianetwork.com/story.php?166314

Name: Bili
Description:
Bili was standing with two other trans people near a bus stand, when a man namely Raja started misbehaving with Bili and got annoyed and stabbed and injured her. Bili died in the hospital.

TvT project: The Nation 26.09.2014

Name: Alexis
Description:
The victim was sent to the hospital due to a wound she had in her gluteus. After being signed off from the hospital, she was found dead in her own house.

Name: Bruna Lakiss
Description:
Bruna and her client Josimar da Silva Oliveira, 26, were shot by a man on a motorbike while they were talking in front of a motel. He died at the scene and Bruna died in hospital.
